name: I Know That Laugh
Lore: 'Jabba''s decadent behavior makes him susceptible to deception. Leia and Lando exploited this weakness, posing as Jabba''s kind of scum.',
Text: 'If Agents In The Court on table, deploy on table. While you have < 13 cards in hand, non-unique aliens are immune to Monnok. For each of your aliens in battle, attrition against opponent is +1. If your alien was just lost from a location, may stack it here face down. (Immune to Alter.)',
